boardgame.name: Alta Tensión: El juego de cartas
Funkenschlag: Das Kartenspiel
Haute Tension: Le Jeu de Cartes
Hoogspanning: Het Kaartspel
Power Grid: The Card Game
Wysokie Napięcie: Gra karciana
電力会社カードゲーム
電力公司紙牌版
boardgame.description: In Power Grid: The Card Game, the players represent CEOs of mighty power companies producing electricity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game, the players bid for power plants at auctions and supply them with resources. Their income depends on the amount of electricity produced in each round. At the end of the game, the player who produces the most electricity wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Power Grid: The Card Game offers all the tension and tactics well-known of its two big brothers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Power Grid and Power Grid deluxe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; without using the different maps. You get the full Power Grid emotions in an intensive playing time of sixty minutes!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To give two players an exciting experience, they will play with the Trust acting as a third player. While challenging the opponent, they must incorporate the schemes of the competing Trust in their plans and use these schemes against their opponent._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game includes a small variant for the Demolition Contractor. This variant is playable with Power Grid: The Card Game, and all maps of Power Grid deluxe and Power Grid!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment to a Kiala service point near you or € 6,95 by PostNL per shipment for delivery at your doorstep. Shipment to Belgium or Luxemburg by Kiala is € 7,50. Shipment to the rest of Western EU is €10,- by DHL up to 2kg, €18,- up to 5kg. Shipment to the rest of the World is €24,- by DHL up to 2 kg. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +5%)
